alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 12 at 2:57PM CDT until April 14 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CDT /5 PM MDT/ THURSDAY TO 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM CDT /5 PM MDT/ Thursday to 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft. People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches.

area.areaDesc: Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
